scripts.sb:sync: bun supabase db push && bun supabase db pull
scripts.sb:linkpush: bun supabase link && bun supabase db push
scripts.sb:typegen: bun supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public > ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts && biome format --write ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts
